original_text: After all this, when Josiah had prepared the temple, Necho king of Egypt came up to fight against Charchemish by Euphrates: and Josiah went out against him.
korean_text: 이 모든 일 후 곧 요시야가 성전을 정돈하기를 마친 후에 애굽 왕 느고가 유브라데 강 가의 갈그미스를 치러 올라왔으므로 요시야가 나가서 방비하였더니

sentences.original_text: when Josiah had prepared the temple
Necho king of Egypt came up
to fight against Charchemish by Euphrates
and Josiah went out against him
